posts.post_content:
Posted By: Scott Forrest
I just listed this on ebay - probably from 1865-75. Also listed some 1920-35 uniforms, with more to come - Crazy Scott says "Everything must go!". With two freshmen in college reality has finally set in. Looks like a 2-3 year collecting hiatus. Even have a '67 Firebird on ebay if anyone is interested.

[url]http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=5191112733&rd=1&sspagename=STRK%3AMESE%3AIT&rd=1[/url]
